grinliz::Quaternion

grinliz::Quaternion Class Reference

A quaternion class. More...

#include <glgeometry.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

A quaternion class.

Whether these are useful or not is still up to debate, but they are certainly getting more common. Lilith uses them for the camera.
